chapter.text: Sapata saraibad'dha phiraistasakalara
tara pichata kathora paraicalakasakalara
arau upadesa grantha tilaratakaraisakalara
niscaya tomalokara ilaha ejana
yijana akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora madhyararti sakalo bastura raba arau udayasthala samuharao raba
Niscaya ami nikatararti akasakhanaka naksatraraajira saundaryarae susobhita karaicho
arau raksa karaicho pratyeka bidraohi cayatanara paraa
Phalata sihamte urd'dhajagatara ekorae suniba noraarae, karana ke'uphalara paraa sihamtara prati niksepa karaa haya (ulkapinda)
sihamtaka khedi pathi'oraara babe, arau sihamtara babe ache abiraama sasti
Kintu hathat konoba'i kiba sunile jbalanta ulkapinda'i tara piche piche khedi yaya
Eteke sihamtaka sudhi coraacona, srstira ksetrata sihamte bechi jatila ne ami ana yibora srsti karaicho se'ibora? Ami sihamtaka dekhuna alatiya matira paraa srsti karaicho
Baram tumi bismaya bodha karaicha, arau sihamte bidraupa karai ache
Arau yetiya sihamtaka upadesa diya haya, tetiya sihamte seya grahana nakarae
Arau yetiya sihamte kono nidarsana dekhe, tetiya sihamte upahasa karae
Arau kaya, ‘e'ito dekhuna suspasta yadura bahirae ana eko nahaya
‘Ami yetiya mrtyubarana karaima lagate mati arau asthita parainata hama, tathapi'o amaka punaraut'thita karaa ha’bane
‘arau amara pitr-purausa sakaloko’
koraa, ‘haya, arau tomaloka ha’ba lanchita’
Eteke seya kerala eta matra pracanda dhamaka, tatksanat sihamte thara lagi ca'i thakiba
Arau sihamte ka’ba, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara! E'ito dekhuna pratidana dirasa’
E'itorae'i phayacalara dina, yi bisaye tomaloke abisbasa karaichila
(Phiraistasakalaka koraa ha’ba) ‘ekatraita karaa yalimasakalaka arau sihamtara sangi-sarathisakalaka arau se'iborako yiborara sihamte ibadata karaichila
allahara bahirae, arau sihamtaka jahannamara patha dekhuraa'i diya
‘arau sihamtaka rakhoraacona, niscaya sihamtaka prasna karaa ha’ba
‘Ki ha’la tomalokara, tomaloke kiya ijane sijanara sahaya karaa na'i etiya’
prakrtate sihamta ha’ba aji atmasamarpanakarai
Arau sihamte ijane sijanara mukha-makhi hai sodha-pocha karaiba
sihamte ka’ba, ‘niscaya tomaloke'i amara ocaralai sapata lai ahichila’
Sihamte (netrsthaniya kaphirabilake) ka’ba, ‘baram tomaloke'i mumina nachila
‘arau tomalokara oparata amara kono kartrtba nachila; daraacalate tomaloke'i achila simalanghanakarai sampradaya
‘Seye amara biraud'dhe amara pratipalakara katha satya hicape sabyasta haiche, niscaya ami sasti asbadana karaima
‘Eteke amiye'i tomalokaka bibhraanta karaichilo, karana ami nije'o achilo bibhraanta’
Tara pichata niscaya sihamta ataye se'idina sastita ansidara ha’ba
Niscaya ami aparaadhibilakara lagata enekuraa acarane'i karao
Sihamtaka yetiya koraa haichila, ‘allahara bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i’, tetiya sihamte ahankara karaichila
Arau kaichila, ‘ami ejana unmada kabira kathata amara ilahasamuhaka barjana karaima neki’
baram te'om satya lai ahiche arau (bigata) raachulasakalako satya buli sbikara karaiche
Niscaya tomaloke yantranadayaka sastira asbadanakarai haba
arau tomaloke yi karaichila kerala tarae'i pratiphala paba
kintu te'omloka nahaya, yisakala allahara ekanistha banda
Te'omlokara babe ache nirdharaita raijikba (jiraika)
Phalamula; arau te'omloka ha’ba sanmanita
niyamaterae bharaa jannatata
mukha-mukhi hai asanata bahiba
Te'omlokara carai'ophale ghurai ghurai paraibesana karaa ha’ba bisud'dha suraapurna patra
subhra ujjbala, yibora ha’ba panakarai sakalara babe susbadu
Tata ksatikara eko nathakiba arau te'omloka e'iborara dbaraa matoraalo naha’ba
Te'omlokara ocarata thakiba anata nayana, danara caku bisista (hurasakala)
Te'omloka yeniba acchadita kani
Tara pichata te'omloke parasparae mukha-mukhi hai sodha-pocha karaiba
Te'omlokara konoba'i ka’ba, ‘(prthiraita) mora ejana sangi achila
si kaichila, tumi'o sihamtara antarbhukta neki, yisakale bisbasa karae ye
‘ami yetiya mrtyubarana karaima arau ami mati o asthita parainata hama tetiya'o amaka pratiphala diya ha’bane’
allahe ka’ba, ‘tomaloke taka dekhiba bicaraa neki’
tara pichata te'om jumi caba arau taka dekha paba jahannamara madhyasthalata
te'om ka’ba, ‘allahara sapata! Tumito moka praaya dhbansahe karaichila
‘mora pratipalakara anugraha naha’le dekhuna mayo (jahannamata) upasthitakrta byaktisakalara antarbhukta ha’lohemtena
(Yike naha'omka etiya) amara arau duna'i mrtyu nahaya
‘amara prathama mrtyura pichata arau amaka sasti'o diya nahaba!’
Niscaya e'itorae'i se'i mahasaphalata
Enekuraa saphalatara babe'i amalakarai sakale amala karaa ucita
(koraacona) apyayanara babe e'iborae'i uttama ne yakkuma gacha uttama
niscaya ami yalimasakalara babe iyaka paraiksasbaraupa srsti karaicho
e'i gacha utpanna haya jahannamara talara paraa
iyara thopa haiche yeniba cayatanara mura
niscaya sihamte e'ito bhaksana karaiba arau se'itora dbaraa'i peta bharaaba
Iyara pichato sihamtara babe thakiba utala panira misrana
Tara pichata sihamtara pratyarartana ha’ba jahannamara ju'ira phale
Niscaya sihamte sihamtara pitr-purausasakalaka pa'ichila pathabhrasta
tathapi'o sihamte sihamtara anusaranata drauta gati karaichila
Arasye sihamtara purbe'o purbarartisakalara sarahabhaga manuhe'i bipathagami haichila
arasye ami sihamtara majato satarkakarai praerana karaichilo
Eteke coraa, yisakalaka satarka karaa haichila, sihamtara parainama ki haichila
kintu allahara ekanistha bandasakalara katha sbatantra
Arau arasye nuhe amaka ahbana karaichila, eteke (coraa) ami kimana uttamabharae samharai jana'ichilo
te'omka arau te'omra paraiyalabargaka ami mahasankatara paraa ud'dhara karaichilo
Arau te'omra bansadhara sakalake'i ami arasista raakhichilo
arau ami parabartisakalara majata te'omra sukhyati raakhi dicho
Samagra srstira majata nuhara prati santi barsita ha'omka
Niscaya ami e'idarae'i satkarmasila sakalaka puraskrta karao
Niscaya te'om achila amara mumina bandasakalara an'yatama
Tara pichata ami anabilakaka duba'i maraichilo
Arau niscaya ibraahima te'omra anusarai sakalarae'i antarbhukta
Smarana karaa, yetiya te'om nija pratipalakara ocarata bisud'dhacitte upasthita haichila
yetiya te'om te'omra pitrka arau te'omra sampradayaka sudhichila, ‘tomaloke kihara ibadata karaicha
‘tomaloke allahara paraibarte alika upasyaborake bicaraa neki
‘tente bisbajagatara pratipalaka samparke tomalokara dharana ki’
tara pichata te'om taraasamuhara pine drstipata karaile
Arau ka’le, ‘niscaya ma'i asustha’
Tara pichata sihamte prsthapradarsana karai te'omra paraa amtarai ga’la
Tara pichata te'om ca'iciti sihamtara upasyaborara ocarata ga’la, arau ka’le, ‘tomaloke nokhoraa kiya’
‘ki ha’la tomalokara, katha nokoraa kiya’
tara pichata te'om sihamtara oparata sajorae aghata karaile
Tetiya (ghurai ahi) manuhe te'omra phale dhapali melile
Te'om ka’le, ‘tomaloke se'iborara upasana karaa neki, yiboraka tomaloke nije'i nirmana karaa’
‘athaca allahe'i srsti karaiche tomalokaka arau tomaloke yi taiyara karaa se'itorao teraemi srsti karaiche’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘iyara babe eta sthapana taiyara karaa, tara pichata iyaka jbalanta ju'ita niksepa karaa’
E'idarae'i sihamte te'omra biraud'dhe cakraantara sankalpa karaichila; kintu ami sihamtaka sampurnaraupe paraabhuta karai dilo
Te'om ka’le, ‘ma'i mora pratipalakara ocaralai gai acho, niscaya teraemi moka hidayata karaiba
‘he mora raba! Moka ejana satkarmaparaayana santana dana karaa’
Tara pichata ami te'omka ejana sahisnu putrara susambada dilo

Eteke yetiya sisuto te'omra pitrra saite calaphuraa karaa arasthata upanita ha’la, tetiya ibraahime ka’le, ‘he mora cenehara putra! Ma'i saponata dekhilo ye, ma'i tomaka yabeha karai acho, etiya koraacona tomara abhimata ki’? Putra'i ka’le, ‘he mora pitr! Apuni yi adesapraapta haiche se'itorae'i karaka. Allahara icchata apuni moka dhairyasila sakalara antarbhukta paba’
Eteke te'omloka ubhaye yetiya anugatya prakasa karaile arau ibraahime te'omra putraka talamura karai suraa'i la’le
tetiya ami te'omka mati ka’lo, ‘he ibraahima
‘tumi dekhuna saponara adesa samca'i palana karaila! Niscaya e'idarae'i ami satkarmasila sakalaka puraskrta karao’
Niscaya e'ito achila eta suspasta paraiksa
Arau ami te'omka mukta karailo eta maha kurabanira binimayata
Arau ami te'omra babe parabartisakalara majata sunama-sukhyati raakhi dicho
Santi barsita ha'omka ibraahimara oparata
E'idarae'i ami satkarmasilasakalaka puraskrta karao
Niscaya te'om achila amara mumina bandasakalara an'yatama
arau ami te'omka ichahakbara susambada dichilo, te'om achila ejana nabi, satkarmasilasakalara an'yatama

Arau ami ibraahimara oparata barakata dana karaichilo arau ichahakbara oparato; arau te'omloka ubhayerae bansadharasakalara majata achila kichumana satkarmasila arau kichumana achila nijara prati spasta atyacarai
Arau arasye ami anugraha karaichilo mucha arau haraunara prati
Arau te'omloka ubhayake lagate te'omlokara sampradayako ud'dhara karaichilo mahasankatara paraa
Arau ami sahaya karaichilo te'omlokaka, phalata te'omloke bijayi haichila
Arau ami ubhayake bisada kitaba pradana karaichilo
Arau ubhayake ami paraicalita karaichilo sarala pathata
Arau ami te'omloka ubhayarae babe parabartisakalara majata sunama-sukhyati raakhi dicho
Mucha arau haraunara oparata barsita ha'omka chalama (santi arau niraapatta)
E'idarae'i ami satkarmasilasakalaka puraskrta karao
Niscaya te'omloka ubhaye achila amara mumina bandasakalara antarbhukta
Arau iliyacho achila raachulasakalara antarbhukta
Yetiya te'om nija sampradayaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane’
‘tomaloke ba'alaka ahbana karaa neki? Athaca paraityaga karaa sarbattoma srastaka
‘allaha, teraemi tomalokara raba, arau tomalokara purbararti pitr-purausasakalorao raba’
Kintu sihamte te'omka asbikara karaichila, seye sihamtaka arasye (sastira babe) upasthita karaa ha’ba
Kintu allahara ekanistha bandasakalara katha sbatantra
Arau ami te'omra babe parabartisakalara majata sunama-sukhyati raakhi dicho
Santi barsita ha'omka iliyachara oparata
Niscaya e'idarae'i ami satkarmasila sakalaka puraskrta karao
Niscaya te'om achila amara mumina bandasakalara an'yatama
Arau niscaya luto achila raachula sakalara antarbhukta
Smarana karaa, yetiya ami te'omka arau te'omra paraiyalabargara sakaloke ud'dhara karaichilo
kerala pichata raai yoraa sakalara antarbhukta ejani brd'dhara bahirae
Tara pichata arasistasakalaka ami sampurnaraupe dhbansa karaichilo
Arau niscaya tomaloke sihamtara dhbansa praapta ancaledi atikrama karaa puraara bhagata
arau raatito. Tathapi'o tomaloke buji noporaane
arau niscaya i'unucho achila raachulasakalara antarbhukta
Smarana karaa, yetiya te'om boja'i nauyanara pine pala'i ga’la
Tara pichata te'om lataraita yogadana karaile arau tata te'om paraabhuta sakalara antarbhukta ha’la
Tara pichata eta danara mache te'omka gili pelale, arau te'om nijake dhikkara di achila
Arau te'om yadi allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosanakarai sakalara antarbhukta naha’lehemtena
tente te'om punaraut'thanara dina laike machara petate'i thakilehemtena
Arasesata te'omka ami niksepa karailo eta trnahina tha'ita, arau te'om achila asustha
Arau ami tara oparata iyakatina prajatira eta gacha gaja'i tulilo
arau te'omka ami eka lakha ba tatokai bechi lokara ocarata praerana karailo
Eteke te'omloke imana anichila, phalata ami te'omlokaka kichu kalara babe jiranopabhoga karaibalai dilo
Eteke sihamtaka sodhacona, ‘(e'ito kenekuraa katha) tomara pratipalakara babe kan'ya santana arau sihamtara babe putra santana’
athaba ami phiraistasakalaka narairaupe srsti karaichilo neki ye, seya sihamte dekhichila
jani thoraa, niscaya sihamte manesaja katha kaya ye
‘allahe santana janma diche’. Niscaya sihamta michaliya
Te'om putra santanara paraibarte kan'ya santana pachanda karaiche neki
ki haiche tomalokara? Tomaloke kenekuraa bicara karaa
tente tomaloke upadesa grahana nakaraibane
ne tomalokara kono suspasta dalila-pramana ache
yadi tomaloke satyabadi tente tomalokara kitaba lai aha
Sihamte allaha arau jina jatira majata atmiyatara samparka sthira karaiche, athaca jinabilake jane ye, niscaya sihamtaka upasthita karaa ha’ba (sastira babe)
Sihamte yi araopa karae tara paraa allaha paraitra arau mahana
kerala allahara ekanistha bandasakalara bahirae
Niscaya tomaloke arau tomaloke yiborara ibadata karaa se'iborae
(ekanistha bandasakalara) kako tomaloke allaha samparke bibhraanta karaiba noraaraiba
kerala prajjbalita ju'ita yijana dagdha ha’ba tara bahirae
Arau (jibraile ka’le) ‘amara pratyekarae babe ache nirdharaita sthana
‘arau niscaya ami saraibad'dhabharae dandayamana
‘arau niscaya ami te'omra paraitrata arau mahima ghosanakarai’
Arau sihamte (makkabasibilake) arasye kaichila
‘purbarartisakalara darae yadi amarao ekhana upadesamulaka kitaba thakilehemtena
‘tente arasye ami allahara ekanistha banda ha’lohemtena’
Kintu sihamte seya (kora'anaka) asbikara karaile, eteke anatipalame sihamte janibalai paba
Niscaya amara praeraita bandasakalara bisaye amara e'i katha purbe'i nirdharaita haiche ye
niscaya te'omloka sahayyapraapta ha’ba
Arau niscaya amara sain'yabahiniye'i bijayi ha’ba
Eteke kichu samayara babe tumi sihamtara paraa mukha ghuraa'i thaka
Arau tumi sihamtaka paryabeksana karaa, atisighrae sihamte dekhibalai paba (iyara parainama)
Sihamte amara sasti tbaraanbita karaiba bicarae neki
eteke yetiya sihamtara cotalata sasti nami ahiba tetiya satarkakrta bilakara prabhata kimana ye nikrsta ha’ba
arau kichu samayara babe tumi sihamtara paraa mukha ghuraa'i thaka
Tumi sihamtaka paryabeksana karaa, atisighrae sihamte dekhibalai paba (iyara parainama)
Sihamte yi araopa karae, tara paraa tomara raba paraitra arau mahana, sakalo ksamatara adhikarai
Arau santi barsita ha'omka raachulasakalara prati
Arau sakalo dharanara prasansa kerala srstijagatara raba allaharae'i praapya
